General.Name: Batavia Prosperindo Trans Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Batavia Prosperindo Trans Tbk operates as a transportation services company in Indonesia. It offers long-term and short-term vehicle rental, driver, and fleet management services. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Batavia Prosperindo Trans Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Batavia Prosperindo Makmur.

2.Name: Ms. Angelia Sundary Ongko B.A., S.E.
2.Title: Corp. Sec.
